info.short_description: Mamot.fr is the mastodon social network instance maintained by La Quadrature du Net, digital freedom organization based in Paris
info.full_description:
mamot.fr is maintained by La Quadrature du Net sysadmin team, a team of volunteers who monitor, upgrade and answer to reports on the services provided by La Quadrature to everyone. We also provide Jabber, Jitsi meet, Searx and Etherpad service to anyone who need it. 
Our policy has been specifically written by our team, and is available in French here : https://mamot.fr/terms

info.short_description: Framapiaf is Framasoft's Mastodon instance. Framasoft is a popular and educational network promoting free software.
info.full_description:
Issu du monde √©ducatif et d√©sormais tourn√©e vers l'√©ducation populaire, Framasoft est avant tout un r√©seau de projets, dont le premier, l'annuaire Framalibre, remonte √† 2001.

Ces projets sont anim√©s par des personnes collaborant autour d'une m√™me volont√© : promouvoir les libert√©s num√©riques.

Le respect des libert√©s fondamentales des utilisatrices et utilisateurs, garanties par des contrats l√©gaux (les licences libres), est au c≈ìur du mouvement libriste et permet de s'assurer que l'humain reste en ma√Ætrise de l'outil num√©rique.

Le but de Framasoft est de proposer, principalement en ligne, un ensemble d'outils concrets et pratiques visant √† faciliter l'adoption :

    de logiciels libres (annuaire, cl√©s USB, installateur‚Ä¶) ;
    de cr√©ations culturelles libres (blog, traduction, maison d'√©dition‚Ä¶) ;
    de services libres (plus de 30 dans le projet D√©googlisons Internet).

Pr√©sent√© comme une ¬´ porte d'entr√©e dans le monde du Libre ¬ª, le r√©seau Framasoft souhaite se positionner comme un trait d'union entre la communaut√© des libristes et le grand public.

info.short_description: Fast, secure and up-to-date instance, welcoming everyone around the world. Join us!
info.full_description:
Why should you sign up on mstdn.io?

This instance is not focused on any theme or subject, feel free to talk about whatever you want. Although the main language is english, we accept every single language and country.

We're connected to the whole OStatus/ActivityPub fediverse and we do not block any foreign instance nor user.

We do have rules (see below), but the goal is to have responsible users. So far we haven't had any issue with moderation

The instance uses a powerful server to ensure speed and stability, and it has good uptime. We follow state-of-the-art security practices. See below for more technical details

Also, we have over 300 custom emojis to unleash your meming potential üëç

info.short_description: Generalistic and moderated instance. All opinions are welcome, but hate speeches are prohibited.
info.full_description:
Generalistic and moderated instance. All opinions are welcome, but hate speeches are prohibited.

Users who don't respect rules will be silenced, or suspended if they harass other people or if the the violation is considered too large.

info.short_description: The cutest general purpose safe instance. We love science and beautiful things. LGBT+ and PoC are welcome.
info.full_description:
Octodon.social is a general purpose instance, where topics are mostly technical and scientific, but there's a bit of everything.
Federates with everything, allows nearly everything lawful in France.
Moderation policy is explained in details on our /about/more page; it is a pretty safe space. Harassment, bullying, or hate speech are not tolerated.
As the definition is often forgotten and altered, a safe space is a community where people (especially women, PoC and LGBT+) are protected from oppression and everyday harassment. Our goal is for every member to feel safe and welcome. (but of course that doesn't apply if you break local rules by being aggressive towards someone else, for instance)

info.short_description:
mastodonten.de ist eine Mastodon Instanz offen f√ºr alle netten Leute. :-)
mastodonten.de is a Mastodon instance open to nice people
info.full_description:
Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfach gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:


- Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
- Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
- Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
- Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
- Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
- Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
- Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social verf√ºgbar in deren Github-Repository.


Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

- Harrassment, stalking, doxxing

- Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof

- Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof

- Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism

- Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading

- Untagged sexual content, gore, or advertisement

- Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement

- Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests


Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.


(Based on the about of chaos.social)

info.full_description:
Beer and free software lovers.
 #nsfw allowed
Our server is hosted in France

info.short_description: soc.ialis.me is a generalist and leftist instance runt by a collective
info.full_description:
Our guidelines are currently being written ; but basically:

* Don't be a dick,
* No advertising, harassment, spam,
* No abuse on the API by local users (bots, ...),
* Any thing illegal under the French law will be removed and reported to the competent authorities.

Informations and status about the instance is posted to @admin. We are 8 forming a administration council ;  @b9AcE @href @jd @wxl @marxistvegan @stephanmaus @Famine @hecate.

Don't hesitate to ping either one of the list or @admin to talk about the instance, create an issue at ialisme/soc.ialis.me on GitHub, or privately at admin (at) soc.ialis.me.

The instance itself is hosted on servers at Online.net and Scaleway.com, in Paris, France. The database and files are frequently replicated on a couple of servers, and externally backuped.

info.short_description: Mastodon by la m√®re zaclys association fran√ßaise

La m√®re Zaclys
Association loi 1901 (France)

L'instance Mastodon est h√©berg√©e en France sur un container LXC sous linux Debian qui nous permet d'ajuster sans coupure les ressources d√©di√©es‚Ä¶

(HDD 100 Go en raid 10 tripl√© sous ZFS avec cache SSD)

info.short_description: Eldritch Caf√© est une instance Mastodon pour les personnes queers, f√©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant¬∑e¬∑s.
info.full_description:
Eldritch Caf√© est une instance Mastodon se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, f√©ministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant¬∑e¬∑s. Nous sommes principalement francophones, mais vous √™tes les bienvenu¬∑e¬∑s quelque soit votre langue.

Les r√®gles de Eldritch Caf√© sont les suivantes‚ÄØ:
1. Ne participez pas √† du harc√®lement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.
2. Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations priv√©es, sauf √† l‚Äô√©quipe de mod√©ration en cas de signalement.
3. Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en g√©n√©ral vous vaudront d‚Äô√™tre suspendu¬∑e, m√™me utilis√©¬∑e¬∑s dans des conversations non-publiques.
4. Il est permis de poster de la pornographie ou de la nudit√© sur l‚Äôinstance, mais seulement en marquant le contenu concern√© comme sensible et en aucun cas sur un fil public.
5. Soyez gentil‚ãÖles les un‚ãÖes avec les autres.

Discussions autour du jeu vid√©o, du japon, de l'informatique et de l'anim√©/manga.

info.topic: Anime, manga, tech, jeux vid√©o, Japon et autres entre adultes responsables.

info.short_description: Unixcorns project instance https://unixcorn.org, mostly french speaking
info.full_description:
Une instance Mastodon tenue √† jour quotidiennement et fournie par Unixcorn. H√©berg√©e en Allemagne, l'un de ses objectif premier est la transparence mais nous vous invitons √† lire l'ensemble des r√®gles d'utilisation. Notre mod√©ration est collaborative, n‚Äôh√©sitez surtout pas √† rapporter tout contenu probl√©matique !

Notre instance est bien s√ªr r√©gie par des r√®gles sp√©cifiques. Premi√®rement aucun sexisme, racisme, homophobie validisme, √¢gisme, grossophobie ou psychophobie, etc n‚Äôest tol√©r√©. Tout message de haine est proscrit, les fascistes et leurs copains nazis sont directement bannis. Dans un autre registre, la publication de spam, de contenu pornographique non d√©sign√© comme tel avec un ‚ÄúContent Warning‚Äù (CW) m√®nent aussi √† une exclusion du serveur. Cette instance Mastodon se veut inclusive et bienveillante, ainsi nous bannirons sans pr√©venir et sans regret. Les comptes bannis ne sont plus accessibles depuis notre instance, vous ne pouvez plus voir leur contenu ni les suivre.
Nous encourageons nos utilisateur-ice-s √† utiliser la fonction de rapport (‚ÄúReport‚Äù) pour nous faire part du contenu et/ou des comptes allant √† l‚Äôencontre de nos r√®gles. D'ailleurs si celles-ci ne vous conviennent pas, ne r√¢lez pas, trouvez simplement un autre serveur.
Nous essayons aussi de mettre en avant l‚Äôaspect activiste de notre d√©marche. Si vous √™tes un-e commercial-e, communiquant-e, travaillant dans le #digital, chez Orange ou la #FrenchTech sachez que vous n‚Äô√™tes pas le/la bienvenu-e. Pendant que nous y sommes si l‚Äô√©criture inclusive vous d√©range sachez que vous n'√™tes qu'√† un clic de souris de la sortie.
Notre r√©seau social, et son r√©seau entier selon nous, est d√©di√© √† la r√©appropriation des moyens de communication et √† la cr√©ation de communaut√©s meilleures pour le collectif. Les cat√©gories de personnes cit√©es dans le paragraphe pr√©c√©dent n'oeuvrant pas du tout (allant m√™me dans le sens contraire) √† la r√©alisation de ces objectifs, elles sont logiquement pas les bienvenues. Merci de rapporter leur pr√©sence si vous les croisez sur notre serveur.

info.short_description: This is an open mastodon instance for social justice activists, LGBTQIA+ people, and people who are aware of such subjects and care about them.
info.full_description:
The instance has multiple goals, the most important of all being making everyone on here feel as safe as possible. Other goals include letting users manage their social life easily and securely, making this instance a nice community with a shared expression space, and making the fediverse better. 

Right now, the only admin and moderator is @wxcafe. This might change in the future, and will be reflected on this page. Please report any content breaking the rules highlighted on this page using the report function. We don't hesitate to moderate posts, to silence and/or suspend users, local or remote, and instances. In France we like to think of this as "Censure Communautariste".


 This server is run on a server paid for by @wxcafe, hosted on Vultr. The server is a 4GB RAM, 2 vCores, 60G disk VPS. It costs $20/months, and is financed using Patreon
The bot @server_status posts information about the status of the server every once in a while, be it graphs about the ressources, number of users and toots, etc...

info.short_description: ◊ê
info.full_description:
Welcome to the ◊ê community!

First, here are the main ideas behind our rules that should be yours:

- The respect of others is primary.
- This instance wants to be peaceful and welcoming.
- Each user is responsible of their account.

Rules of Aleph.land

You can be suspended for:

- Sharing content that is illegal in France (pedophilia, mainly).
- Taking part of a harassment.
- Putting someone in danger.
- Having a racist, sexist, discriminating or oppressive talk.
- Voluntarily degrading the prosperity or the good atmosphere of the instance.

You can be muted from the public timelines for:

- Posting a media, some text or a link to the following contents without an explicit content warning and NSFW cover:
    - nudity (#nude)
    - gore (#gore)
    - pornography (#porn)
    - a flashy media that could be harmful for photosensitive people (#epilepsywarning)
    - spoil (#spoil)
- Unpleasant shitposting or flooding.
- Making abusive ads.
- Posting automatic toots from another source.

Please keep in mind that this rules are here to guarantee a good experience to everyone on the instance. Also, this list is not exhaustive and moderators will do their best to solve problems that may not have been specified here.
If you have any question, or suggestion, don't hesitate to contact me at @Madeorsk@aleph.land! :) 

You can also donate every month to help me to maintain this instance: patreon.com/alephland

info.short_description: Instance Mastodon francophone et avec une mod√©ration active. Mostly French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.
info.full_description:
oc.todon.fr est une instance Mastodon francophone et avec une mod√©ration active. French-speaking Mastodon instance with active moderation.

R√®gles :

Aucun type de harc√®lement ou de (micro-)agression n'est tol√©r√©, qu'elles soient personnelles ou rel√®vent d'un syst√®me oppressif (misogynie, racisme, LGBTphobies/queerphobie, validisme, etc.). De m√™me pour la promotion de ces oppressions et des mouvements politiques associ√©s (masculinisme, supr√©macisme, etc.).

La pornographie et la nudit√© sont tol√©r√©es pour le moment, mais doivent √™tre obligatoirement indiqu√©es comme NSFW. De m√™me pour contenus sensibles/choquants, qui doivent avoir un Content Warning appropri√©.

Sauf exception accord√©e par l'admin, les publicit√©s sont bannies de cette instance.

info.short_description: An instance for open source developers, free culture community and dreamers.
info.full_description:
Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

We are Nasqueron.

info.short_description: Do you like old hardware ? Do you use them ? Perfect you're welcome here !
info.full_description:
Welcome !
This is an open Mastodon instance, basically.
It's run by the person you see on the right (that's me!) and for now, that's all.
There might be more admins and moderators later if the needs come but alas not yet.

I hope this instance works okay for you, and that you can find a nice and welcoming community here! Feel free to hit me up if you have any questions or requests, be it about this instance, how to make your own instance, or other things not related to Mastodon.

I am actually the only sysadmin of this instance and I can't work full-time on oldbytes.space so, I will do whatever I can in a reasonable time to make it works the best it can.

Rules
This instance has some rules, of course.
First, there are the usual : no sexism, no racism, no hate speech, no LGBTQphobia, no nazis, no spam, no public unflagged porn, etc...
Then, I also believe it's important to remind you that this server was made and is run by a queer activist.
This server thrives to be inclusive, and I will ban without much regret.
People are encouraged to use the report function as they see fit, and can be confident that their complaints will be heard and dealt with in some way. I want everyone to feel safe here, and if that doesn't sound like something you like, you should probably find another server.

There's also a pretty important activism aspect of this instance.
If you're a marketer, a #digital #influencer, this is not the place for you. Not only do I feel you should not feel welcome, I intend to make you feel definitely NOT welcome.
This instance, and this entire social network in my opinion, is dedicated to reclaiming social media, decentralizing, and generally creating better and more engaging communities.
The three categories of people I mentioned earlier are not, in my opinion, working towards this goal, pretty much the opposite, and they are not welcome on this server.
Please report them if you see them.
We also block Nazis, techbros and RMS.

info.short_description: djs.social is a social network by DJs for DJs. No self-promotion. No advertising.
info.full_description:
There are no adverts here, no companies, just real people. We are non-profit so you can be sure you data will always remain yours and will never be sold to anyone. The site is actively moderated so we keep the trolls at bay.

We don't reorder your timeline. We don't suggest who you should follow and we don't tolerate abusive behavior of any kind. No one here cares about how many followers or ''likes' you have. You be you. Everyone is equal.

You can use it from the web or using one of the many iOS or Android clients.

djs.social is a part of the Mastodon fediverse. If you don't know what that means, trust us it's nerdy but it's really cool.

Join us and help make djs.social an amazing place to hang out, share stories and experiences.

info.short_description: Instance g√©r√© par l'association eunivers, groupe ouvert de passionn√©s du monde de l‚Äô√©lectronique, des jeux vid√©o, du esport, s√©rie, manga, cin√© etc..
info.full_description:
Instance g√©r√© par l'association eunivers, groupe ouvert de passionn√©s du monde de l‚Äô√©lectronique, des jeux vid√©o, du esport, s√©rie, manga, cin√© etc..

Les r√®gles suivantes ne repr√©sente pas un document l√©gal, et l'interpr√©tation finale incombe √† l'administration de eunivers.social; elles sont l√† pour vous donner un aper√ßu de nos politiques de mod√©ration:

Ne floodez pas,

info.short_description:
Instance g√©r√©e par roflcopter.fr membre du collectif C.H.A.T.O.N.S.
--
This instance is managed by roflcopter.fr team.
Proud member of C.H.A.T.O.N.S.
info.full_description:
=== Charte & Manifeste
roflcopter.fr adh√®re √† la charte et manifeste des CHATONS.

=== Infrastructure
Les services de roflcopter.fr sont h√©berg√©s en France sur plusieurs serveurs d√©di√©s lou√©s chez Online.net.
Nous utilisons exclusivement que des logiciels open-source.
Les donn√©es h√©berg√©es sont stock√©es sur un support chiffr√© et sauvegard√© :
- via un syst√®me de r√©plication temps r√©√©el (DRBD)
- de fa√ßon quotidienne et incr√©mentielle, le tout export√© sur un serveur h√©berg√© chez OVH

== Utilisation des services
* L‚Äôutilisation des services se fait √† vos propres risques. Ils sont fournis tel quel.
* Vous √™tes responsable de la s√©curit√© de votre compte et de votre mot de passe.
* roflcopter.fr ne peut pas et ne sera pas responsable de toutes pertes ou dommages r√©sultant de votre non-respect de cette obligation de s√©curit√©.
* Vous √™tes responsable de tout contenu affich√© et de l‚Äôactivit√© qui se produit sous votre compte.
* Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser le service √† des fins ill√©gales ou non autoris√©es.
* Vous ne devez pas transgresser les lois de votre pays.

info.short_description: Hello everybody. This instance is for the administrator only (at least for now).
info.full_description:
Welcome on social.tuto-craft.com !

Let me introduce myself !

I'm Skid, the admin, a french tech enthusiast and sysadmin. I run a french web site and other things if you're interested.
Why should you sign up on social.tuto-craft.com ?

At the moment ... you can't o/

This instance is running on a little VPS hosted by OVH in Strasbourg.

It has 1 vCPU of a Intel Xeon E5
2Go of ram
10 Go of SSD
100mbps bandwith

This instance is IPv6 compatible, has good HTTPS parameters, is following good security practices, has a good uptime is focused on speed and will be updated regularly, it's always running the latest stable version.
Rules :

‚Ä¢ Don't flood
‚Ä¢ Respect each other
‚Ä¢ I (the admin) support freedom of speech, so I won't block accounts or instances unless there is a good reason (like a legal one)
‚Ä¢ Use NSFW tags for NSFW content üîû
‚Ä¢ Use content warning for spoilers
‚Ä¢ Bots are allowed only I they don't spam toots and don't post a lot of pictures
‚Ä¢ Any language is allowed üåé
‚Ä¢ Have fun üéâ

Feel free to block or mute whoever you want.
Donations

If you can, donate to the main dev, he is the one making the hard work for Mastodon : Gargron's Patreon

If you can't help financially, don't worry ! Just talk about Mastodon around you, help the new users, and toot every day !

Thank you, and happy tooting!

info.short_description: Up-to-date instance (running on latest tagged releases), and opened to everyone :).
info.full_description:
The instance is running since the 03-04-2017, always on the last tagged release !
It's opened to everyone, everything is allowed, except illegal things in France, where are the servers, harrassment and spam. IPv6 is activated, and storage is provided by an HDD RAID1. The instance is federating with everyone !

info.short_description: First, it was only an instance for me, but some people wanted to have a home to toot in peace, so I opened up the registrations for all !
info.full_description: No content will be admin-blocked nor admin-silenced. If any content hurt you, you have to block it from yourself.
